Docs.summary: Provides customized assembly binding for designers that are used to create [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This feature is used only in developer mode for [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] apps. It enables designers to supply isolated binding contexts as required, during iterative development of assemblies.
